TopicTitle: Thank you for supporting us in the Golden Joystick awards!

Articles.Content: We won the Golden Joystick Award for best indie game of 2015 yesterday, and we owe a lot to every one of you, playing the game and spreading the word, and obviously voting for us in awards. Thank you guys and girls so much, we're incredibly thrilled with this one. Stay awesome!

When I heard KSP was in the running, I skipped through all of the catagories just to vote for KSP. All of you deserve it!

and of course GRATz!

-SPAddict

which propellant did the rocket on the picture use? *-/

Topic:

gratz: watched the whole show. was sad that you "just" got the upcommer-place on another category (cant remember right now)
yay! i just got an email a few days ago, was going to post on it! you guys beat me to it. congrats on the award!

I voted for you for overall game of the year, I was kind of disappointed you didn't win that.

Had there been a category I would have voted for you in "favorite game of all time, ever". And to put that in perspective a little, I'm an old fart who's played games all his life. My first game was Zork. When it was new.
Congrats! Now if jeb can learn to actually make use of those landing legs to set down instead of the nose of the spacecraft!
Congrats!! You guys deserve it! Keep up the good work!

Kerbin sure does look happy.

Also post approval still seems to be in effect

Edited November 3, 2015 by longbyte1
Congratulations and well deserved! Thank you Squad for all the hard work producing such a fantastic game!!!
Do great work and you will be recognized for i, and you guys have done some amazing work!

You get what you deserve.

Tomorrow we'll continue to yell at you for not fixing [insert j.random bug]
FINALLY, KSP is given it's proper recognition. whoot!

+1 on what fuel the rocket uses..it appears to be fired on monopropellant?

 

Great job on the golden joystick award squad..KSPs become more than any sandbox game ever has for me.. Its a well deserved award for simulation in general

4 hours ago, Overland said:

+1 on what fuel the rocket uses..it appears to be fired on monopropellant?

It's a silent hint that all stock tanks will be going fuel-switchable for 1.1. (Hey, that's my wish, I can dream what I want.)

Very belated congrats on the golden joystick, SQUAD. Only now seeing this, ugh.

...

Sooo... I have to ask: does it provide enough motivation to tweak the KSP joystick code a lil more?

On 10/31/2015 at 5:42 PM, KasperVld said:

We won the Golden Joystick Award for best indie game of 2015 yesterday, and we owe a lot to every one of you, playing the game and spreading the word, and obviously voting for us in awards. Thank you guys and girls so much, we're incredibly thrilled with this one. Stay awesome!

amazing work
